home.header1: Fresh vegetables and fruits without leaving your home?
home.header2: Fuddi is the application for you!
home.header3: Download the Beta on Google Play now

headers.header1: What values do we want the application to carry?
headers.header2: We wish to bring together three groups of Fuddi users

lgBox.box1: We create an m-commerce platform thanks to which everyday shopping will be simple and fast.
lgBox.box2: The products offered will be of the highest quality at an affordable price. We want to show that the products made with the use of hands are not only tastier, but also have a part of their creator or, in the case of fruit and vegetables, the accent of the person who took care of them.

box1.content: If there was no client, there would be no application.

box2.content: Farmers and craftsmen, thanks to their hard work, produce the highest quality product.

box3.content: Any person who declares the willingness to deliver the goods from the manufacturer to the customer during the trip.
